lead.p: cos â€” Returns the cosine of an angle measured in radians.

return.p: number. A number between -1 and 1 representing cosine of the angle.

example.heading: cos example
example.code: console.log(Math.cos(0)); // 1 console.log(Math.cos(1)); // 0.5403023058681398 console.log(Math.cos(9)); // -0.911130261884677 console.log(Math.cos(Math.PI)); // -1 console.log(Math.cos(2 * Math.PI)); // 1 console.log(Math.cos(-1)); // 0.5403023058681398
